TEXT.TITLE: PROPOSED OFFERINGS RECENTLY FILED WITH THE SEC
TEXT.BODY: The following proposed securities offerings were filed recently with the Securities and Exchange Commission: Bio-Technology General Corp <BTGC> - Offering of 25 mln dlrs of convertible senior subordinated notes due March 1997 through Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc. Reuter
